page.title: 13CLUBS RECREATION SPORTS
page.content: {COWLING CRICKET CLUB} There are two amateur teams in the village.They are the junior side and the senior side.They both play matches against other teams.The Juniors meet at 6-30 p.m.on Wednesdays and Fridays. Juniors can start at seven years old. Good players can be picked for the Senior team when they are seventeen. {COWLING FOOTBALL CLUB Both junior and senior teams are amateurs.Seniors are under 17 years,and Juniors under 14 years.They also play matches against teams from other villages. Practices are on Tuesdays and Thursdays 7-0 p.m. to 8-45p.m. {TENNIS CLUB There is an active tennis club in Cowling,too,with two courts on which members may practice at any time.
